body_html: Given the simplicity of this activation function, controversy over prior work, and unclear improvements, we probably want to hold off from adding this straight away.
body_text: Given the simplicity of this activation function, controversy over prior work, and unclear improvements, we probably want to hold off from adding this straight away.
body: Given the simplicity of this activation function, [controversy over prior work](https://www.reddit.com/r/MachineLearning/comments/773epu/r_swish_a_selfgated_activation_function_google/), and [unclear improvements](https://twitter.com/ajmooch/status/921056455045844992), we probably want to hold off from adding this straight away.
